image-row.name: Image Hover Mod (On Row variant)
image-row.description: Adds larger images on mouse hover. Will slow down page loads.

image-img.name: Image Hover Mod (On Image variant)
image-img.description: Adds larger images on mouse hover. Will slow down page loads.

review.name: Review-style/note-style Tags
review.description: Widens the tag box and condenses it all into one cohesive paragraph, disabling tag functionality. Great for mini-reviews or quick notes.

fav-l.name: Favourite Hearts (Left variant)
fav-l.description:
This modification changes the appearance of any tag called "Favourite" or "Favorite" to display at the side of the list entry as a heart.

Limitations:
  • This mod cannot detect your MAL favourites. It only changes the appearance of correctly labelled tags, nothing more. Due to this, however, you can have more than 20 entries tagged as favourites. Part of why I made this was to circumvent the item limit on non-supporter profiles.
  • If using the left-side Favourite Tag with the unedited Image Hover mod then the hover image will cover up the tag on mouse-over. You can avoid this by using the right-side version or the edited (Hover on Circle) Image Hover mod.

horizontal.name: Horizontal Tags
horizontal.description: Convert the vertical tags into a horizontal line across the bottom of each list item.

render.name: Character Renders
render.description: Adds two optional character renders on the left and right of the list. Do note that the renders will not be properly visible at low resolutions. I recommend having at least a 1600x900 monitor to add renders, as they purposefully do not intersect the center list area.

transparent-rows.name: Transparent List Rows
transparent-rows.description: This is useful in tandem with the background image, in-case you want to show it off a bit more. It will not work without a background image.

banner-height.name: Change Banner Height
banner-height.description: Modify the banner height to your preference.

sta.name: Increase the Status Bar Width
sta.description: Increase the width of the coloured bar that indicates whether the entry is completed, dropped, etc.

lis.name: Coloured Line on Header
lis.description: Adds a coloured line around the header bar and avatar for some extra flair. Single colour variant.

lic.name: Coloured Line on Header - Category-coloured
lic.description: Adds a coloured line around the header bar and avatar for some extra flair. Category-coloured variant.

cach.name: Category-coloured Header Text
cach.description: Colours the header to match the referenced categories.
